column2: "Hey, glad to see you're looking well after such a fierce battle."
"The decisive battle against Dark Falz. Well, I guess it was business as usual for you."
"I've heard that 戸惑っているアークスはそれなりにいる."
"封印されていたってことも隠されていたわけだしね。"
"Still, I guess it's not such a surprise."
"ARKS is an organisation like any other, so they could have any number of secrets."
"何が言いたいかというとアークスって組織に、夢を見すぎるとよくないよ、ってことだね。"
"誰にだって秘密はあるし人が作った組織は、人の埒外まで至ることは決してない。"
"It's totally normal to have secrets. If that's some world-shattering revelation to you, then you need to grow up."
"Well, you seem to be handling it alright. Whether it's because you're a big-shot, or you just don't care, I simply couldn't say."
